To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private TriangularMovingAverage _trima;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_trima = TRIMA(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_trima.IsReady)
{
    var current = _trima.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.trima = self.TRIMA(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.trima.IsReady:
    current = self.trima.Current.Value
